subNode:value.scalar:string: Show how many people are watching a product page, last sale and last cart added.
Display the number of people who are currently watching this product?
If you activate the option above, you must activate the first option of StatData module
Display the last time the product has been ordered?
If not ordered yet, display the last time the product has been added to a cart?
Do not display events older than:

scalar:array.comment: /* First we try to display the number of people who are currently watching this product page */

subNode:value.scalar:string: connections_page cp ON (p.id_page = cp.id_page) WHERE p.id_page_type = 1 AND p.id_object =

scalar:array.comment: /* Then, we try to display last sale */

subNode:value.scalar:string: orders o ON (od.id_order = o.id_order) WHERE od.product_id =

scalar:array.comment: /* No sale? display last cart add instead */
